attributes.action: administer a solution to the problem of knife and gun crime in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last 18 months, in London alone 44 youths have lost their lives thanks to knife/gun/violent crime. The names of 2008's victims thus far:
1) Henri Bolombi, 17. Stabbed in Edmonton, 1/1/08
2) Faridon Alizada, 18. Stabbed in Erith, 4/1/08
3) Louis Boduka, 18. Stabbed in Edmonton, 21/1/08
4) Fuad Buraleh, 19. Beaten to death in Ealing, 26/1/08
5) Sunday Essiet, 15. Stabbed in Plumstead, 19/2/08
6) Tung Le, 17. Stabbed in Trafalgar Square, 23/2/08. Died 2/3/08
7) Ofiyke Nmezu, 16. Attacked in Edmonton, 15/2/08. Died 29/2/08
8) Michael Alexander Jones, 18. Stabbed in Edmonton, 13/3/08
9) Nicholas Clarke, 19. Shot in Stockwell, 14/3/08
10) Devoe Roach, 17. Stabbed in Stamford Hill, 27/3/08
11) Amro Elbadawi, 14. Stabbed in West Kilburn, 27/3/08
12) Lyle Tulloch, 15. Stabbed in Southwark, 4/5/08
13) Jimmy Mizen, 16. Slashed in Lee, 9/5/08
14) Robert Knox, 18. Stabbed in Sidcup, 24/5/08
15) Sharmaake Hassan, 17. Shot in Camden, 24/5/08, died 28/5/08
16) Arsema Dawit, 15. Stabbed in Lambeth, 2/6/08
17) Ben Kinsella, 16. Stabbed in Holloway, 29/6/08 
18) Shakilus Townsend, 16. Stabbed in Thornton Heath, 3/7/08

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
